page.title: 18WASHINGTON SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: The Galleries is a modern shopping complex in the centre of Washington. It has different kinds of shops including three hypermarkets which are Savacentre,Woolco and Presto.The Galleries is open six days a week.Most stores operate a 9.a.m. to 5.30.p.m. policy but Savacentre and Presto remain open till 8.00.p.m. most nights and till 9.00.p.m. on Fridays,whilst Woolco remains open till 8.00.p.m. Tuesdays to Fridays. To the South of the Galleries are numerous facilities which include a Library,a Health Centre,a Careers Office,a Police Station,a Swimming Pool,a Sauna,Squash Courts and a Sports Centre.
